title: No champion masteries/score?
body:
So, after patching, I found out that either a glitch happened or my champion masteries and score have been wiped. Either way, it's at 0, which is kind of annoying to see. I was at 255, with 10 champions at rank 5. Which took some time since I lost a lot. I'm hoping someone has an explanation to whether this was intentional or was a glitch in the patch. {{item:3070}} 

Here's proof:
http://i.imgur.com/l2z6yCJ.png
http://i.imgur.com/cPTFqfC.png
http://i.imgur.com/qnCQgHI.png

replies.body:
Every time something like this happens, it's just a glitch so don't worry about it. If it was intentional Riot would have put up announcements a while ago. 

I checked over on your profile and your mastery points are back and it's showing your top 3 + in progress champs :D
